Change-log for sqlalchemy-fileattach.

This file will be added to as part of each release

Version 0.1.3, Sat 06 Sep 2014
===============================

faecd3d603	Fixing error in file field handling (Adam Charnock)

===============================

08cccaa3bc	Fixing error in file field handling (Adam Charnock)


Version 0.1.1, Tue 02 Sep 2014
===============================

9309ec8708	Improving handling of None values (Adam Charnock)


Version 0.1.0 (first version), Mon 01 Sep 2014
